sentences.sentence: It can handle the nuclear power of 100 kilotons.
sentences.translation: 它能够处理10万吨的核能量。

sentences.sentence: It could carry a single thermonuclear warhead with a maximum explosive force of 50 kilotons.
sentences.translation: 它可以携带最多为50千吨爆发力单一热核弹头。

sentences.sentence: This paper introduces dynamic real-time simulation training system for the whole process of the third PTA plant of Yangzi chemical plant with an annual production capacity of 450 kilotons.
sentences.translation: 介绍扬子化工厂PTA三线年产45万吨对苯二甲酸全流程仿真培训系统的开发过程。
